prompt.content: Give the answer to the following question as a percentage rounded to two decimals: What was Tesla’s total employee headcount as of December 31, 2024, and what percentage of employees were part of the manufacturing development program?

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Total Employee Headcount described as \"“employee headcount worldwide was 125,665”. "},{"criteria":"Employee headcount number used in formula was 125,665 ","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Manufacturing Development Program hires described as 'hired over 800 graduates'","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Hires number used in formula was 800"},{"criteria":"The formula stated to find the answer was Percentage = (Program Hires/Total Employees) × 100","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"The raw answer was formatted as follows: 800 ÷ 125,665 × 100 = 0.6366%","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"The answer was a percentage ","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"The answer was rounded to two decimals","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"The answer was 0.64%"}]
